ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] ROK city
ygData.msgSnippet: Most likely they desperately wanted to take a swipe at you but you were too fast.  If they agro on you you get on their list whether they ever catch you to
ygData.messageBody:
Most likely they desperately wanted to take a swipe at you but you were too
fast. If they agro on you you get on their list whether they ever catch you
to take a swing or not. This also happens on Antonica, but most zones
aren't huge enough for it to be common. Used to happen to me with bandits
in W Karana all the time.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
Sent: Monday, May 08, 2000 2:48 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] ROK city


That's what I was finding, too. If I got anywhere near a Drachnid without
it actually aggro'ing on me or me taking a swipe at it, sooner or later I'd
get a bad faction message. Mayong really loves me now. ;)


---------------------------
We were getting them near the Sarnak fortress in Lake of Ill Omen.
We petitioned, and the guide said if a sarnak even looked at you, you
got on its aggro list -- and thus got faction hits
